Package it.polimi.ingsw.server

Class Game

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.server.Game
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.lang.Runnable
public class Game
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.lang.Runnable
This class is responsible for instantiating the controller and model classes, receiving and dispatching requests from the clients and sending requests and responses to them.

This class maintains the correlations between VirtualClient(s) and nickname(s), in order to be able to expose methods parametric in VirtualClient, find the corresponding nickname and call Controller's methods, which are parametric in String.

    • getNicknameByClient

      public java.lang.String getNicknameByClient​(VirtualClient virtualClient)

    • distributeInitialSelection

      public void distributeInitialSelection​(VirtualClient _vClient, java.util.ArrayList<CardLeader> _cardLeader, Resource _resource1, Resource _resource2)
      This method is called by ResponseInitialSelection's read() method. It is used to assign a player's selection of card leaders and bonus resources.
      Parameters:
      _vClient - The VirtualClient corresponding to the player that has sent the response.
      _cardLeader - An ArrayList of CardLeader, which contains the cards selected by the player.
      _resource1 - The first bonus resource selected, null if the player does not have rights to obtain the resource.
      _resource2 - The second bonus resource selected, null if the player does not have rights to obtain the resource.

    • advanceTurn

      public void advanceTurn​(VirtualClient _vClient)
      This method is called by a RequestEndTurn's read() method. It calls Controller's advanceTurn() method and responds to the ClientRequest accordingly. Finally, it notifies all players who the new active player has become.
      Parameters:
      _vClient - The VirtualClient associated with the player that requested to end his turn.

    • buyAndPlaceDevCard

      public void buyAndPlaceDevCard​(VirtualClient _vClient, int _rowIndex, int _colIndex, int _placementIndex) throws NotActivePlayerException, InvalidCardDevelopmentPlacementException, InvalidSlotIndexException, NotEnoughResourcesException, FullSlotException, MainMoveAlreadyMadeException
      This method is called by a RequestBuyDevelopmentCard's read() method.
      Parameters:
      _vClient - The VirtualClient associated with the player that sent the request.
      _rowIndex - The row index of the desired CardDevelopment within the market matrix.
      _colIndex - The column index of the desired CardDevelopment within the market matrix.
      _placementIndex - The placement index of the selected CardDevelopmentSlot, in which the newly bought card is to placed.
      Throws:
      InvalidCardDevelopmentPlacementException - : thrown if the selected placement index would not consent for a legal placement.
      InvalidSlotIndexException - : thrown if an invalid index was selected as the placement index.
      NotEnoughResourcesException - : thrown if the player does not hold enough resources to buy the desired card.
      FullSlotException - : thrown if the slot at _placementIndex already holds 3 cards.
      NotActivePlayerException - : thrown if a player who is not the active player has tried to make this action.
      MainMoveAlreadyMadeException

    • useMarket

      public java.util.HashMap<Resource,​java.lang.Integer> useMarket​(VirtualClient _vClient, int _index, java.lang.String _selection) throws NotActivePlayerException, java.lang.IllegalArgumentException, MainMoveAlreadyMadeException
      This method is called by a RequestMarketUse's read() method.
      Parameters:
      _vClient - The VirtualClient associated with the player that sent the request.
      _index - The index of the selected line from which to retrieve the Marbles.
      _selection - Field must be either "row" or "column".
      Returns:
      null if no resources must be discarded after obtaining them from the market, an instance of HashMap containing the newly obtained resources if one or more resources must be discarded.
      Throws:
      NotActivePlayerException - : thrown if a player who is not the active player has tried to make this action.
      java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - : thrown if an invalid _index was selected by the player.
      MainMoveAlreadyMadeException

    • discardResources

      public java.util.HashMap<Resource,​java.lang.Integer> discardResources​(VirtualClient _vClient, java.util.HashMap<Resource,​java.lang.Integer> _discardSelection) throws NotActivePlayerException
      This method is called by a ResponseDiscardResourceSelection's read() method.
      Parameters:
      _vClient - The VirtualClient associated with the player that sent the request.
      _discardSelection - An instance of HashMap containing the amounts to be discarded for each Resource
      Returns:
      null if _discardSelection allowed for the remaining resources to be added to the player's deposit, an instance of HashMap containing the previously obtained resources if the selection did not allow for the remaining resources to be added to the deposit.
      Throws:
      NotActivePlayerException - : thrown if a player who is not the active player has tried to make this action.

    • activateLeaderCard

      public boolean activateLeaderCard​(VirtualClient _vClient, CardLeader _cardToBeActivated) throws NotActivePlayerException
      This method is called by a RequestActivateCardLeader's read() method.
      Parameters:
      _vClient - The VirtualClient associated with the player that sent the request.
      _cardToBeActivated - The CardLeader to be activated.
      Returns:
      true if CardLeader was successfully activated, false if it could not be activated.
      Throws:
      NotActivePlayerException - : thrown if a player who is not the active player has tried to make this action.

    • activateProductionPowers

      public void activateProductionPowers​(VirtualClient _vClient, ProductionSelection _selection) throws NotActivePlayerException, InvalidSlotIndexException, NotEnoughResourcesException, MainMoveAlreadyMadeException, CardLeaderRequirementsNotMetException
      This method is called by a RequestActivateProduction's read() method.
      Parameters:
      _vClient - The VirtualClient associated with the player that sent the request.
      _selection - An instance of ProductionSelection.
      Throws:
      NotActivePlayerException - : thrown if a player who is not the active player has tried to make this action.
      InvalidSlotIndexException - : thrown if an invalid index for a CardDevelopmentSlot was selected in _selection
      NotEnoughResourcesException - : thrown if the player does not hold enough resources to activate all of the selected production powers.
      MainMoveAlreadyMadeException
      CardLeaderRequirementsNotMetException

    • sendAndWait

      public void sendAndWait​(VirtualClient virtualClient, ServerMessage serverMessage, java.lang.Integer timeoutInSeconds) throws RequestTimedOutException
      Overloaded sendAndWait() method. This method is used to send a ServerMessage to a VirtualClient and block the thread until the Client has sent his response.
      Parameters:
      virtualClient - Target VirtualClient.
      serverMessage - Instance of ServerMessage to be sent to target VirtualClient.
      timeoutInSeconds - Amount of seconds the thread will wait for the Client's response. If timeoutInSeconds == -1, the thread will wait forever.
      Throws:
      RequestTimedOutException - : thrown if the timeout expires and no response has been received.

    • sendAndWait

      public void sendAndWait​(java.lang.String nickname, ServerMessage serverMessage, java.lang.Integer timeoutInSeconds) throws RequestTimedOutException

      Parameters:

      serverMessage - Instance of ServerMessage to be sent to target VirtualClient.
      timeoutInSeconds - Amount of seconds the thread will wait for the Client's response. If timeoutInSeconds == -1, the thread will wait forever.
      Throws:
      RequestTimedOutException - : thrown if the timeout expires and no response has been received.

    • discardCardLeader

      public void discardCardLeader​(VirtualClient virtualClient, java.lang.Integer cardLeaderIndex) throws NotActivePlayerException
      Proxy method for Controller.discardCardLeader.
      Parameters:
      virtualClient - VirtualClient that wishes to discard a leader card.
      cardLeaderIndex - The index within the player's cardsLeader array of the card to be discarded, must be > 0 and < cardsLeader.length()
      Throws:
      NotActivePlayerException

    • notifyDisconnectionOfClient

      public void notifyDisconnectionOfClient​(VirtualClient virtualClient)
      Method to be called when the server notices that a client has disconnected. It first removes the player from the internal HashMaps, then it sets the player's connection status within the TurnController to false. Thus, if the disconnected player was the one whose turn it was to play, it forces the turn to advance to the next available player. Finally, it broadcasts to all connected players that {@param virtualClient} has disconnected.
      Parameters:
      virtualClient - VirtualClient associated with the Client that has disconnected.

    • notifyReconnection

      public void notifyReconnection​(java.lang.String nickname, VirtualClient virtualClient)
      Method to be called when the server notices that a disconnected client has restablished a connection. It first inserts the Client's associated {@param virtualClient} and {@param nickname} in the internal HashMaps. Thus it sets the Game instance associated with {@param virtualClient} to this and sets the player's connection status within TurnController to true. Finally, it broadcasts to all players that the player with associated {@param nickname} has reconnected.
      Parameters:
      nickname - Nickname of the player that has reconnected to the server.
      virtualClient - VirtualClient associated with the Client that has reconnected to the server.

    • removeVirtualClient

      private void removeVirtualClient​(VirtualClient virtualClient)
      remove VirtualClient from this Game
      Parameters:
      virtualClient - to be removed

      Parameters:
